body.p: The amendments made in 2011 clarify that:

li.p: the estimate of the defined benefit obligation includes the present value of taxes payable by the plan if they relate to service before the reporting date or are imposed on benefits resulting from that service, and
other taxes should be included as a reduction to the return on plan assets.
